publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-634 Alasdair Allan: Gratias Agemusâ€”That the Parliament notes the significant contribution made by Mr David Shanks to promoting the teaching of Latin, Greek and classical studies in Scottish schools; marks his three decades teaching at Selkirk High School; congratulates him on his retirement and wishes him well for the future, and notes with affection the influence he has had, for good or ill, on at least three current members of this Parliament. Supported by: Jim Hume*, Derek Brownlee*
S3M-634 Gratias Agemus (lodged on 11 October 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
